resources.string: A young man was walking through a supermarket.\nSuddenly he noticed that he __________(FOLLOW) by an old lady.

When he went to the checkout line, she got in front of him.\n"Pardon me," she said,\n"I'm sorry if I made you feel uncomfortable. It's just that you look exactly like my son whom I __________(NOT SEE) for about 10 years."

"I'm very sorry," replied the young man,
"Is there anything I can do for you?"
"Yes," she said.
"As I'm leaving, can you say 'Goodbye mother'? It would make me feel much __________(GOOD)".
"Sure," answered the young man. As the old woman was leaving, he called out, "Goodbye mother!"
